# AVCaption.FontStyle

**Enumeration**

Font styles for caption text.

## Declaration

```swift
enum FontStyle
```

## Font styles

- **AVCaption.FontStyle.unknown**: An unknown font style.
- **AVCaption.FontStyle.normal**: A normal font style.
- **AVCaption.FontStyle.italic**: An italic font style.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Accessing font styles

- **fontStyle(at:)**: Returns the font style and range at the index position.
- **fontWeight(at:)**: Returns the font weight and range at the index position.
- **AVCaption.FontWeight**: Font weights for a caption.
- **decoration(at:)**: Returns the text decoration at the index position.
- **AVCaption.Decoration**: Text decorations for caption text.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Returns the font style and range at the index position.
items.name: fontStyle(at:)

items.description: Returns the font weight and range at the index position.
